tags: None
review:
I recently visited Dr. Preksha Shah for a routine cleaning and filling, and I must say, it was an exceptional experience from start to finish.

Upon entering the clinic, I immediately felt welcomed by the warm atmosphere and the friendly demeanor of the staff. The cleanliness and organization of the office further added to my comfort and confidence in the care I was about to receive.

During the cleaning, the dental hygienist was both thorough and gentle, ensuring my comfort throughout the procedure. Dr. Preksha Shah's expertise was evident as they carefully examined my teeth and explained the necessity for the filling in detail.

Dr. Preksha Shah's professionalism and approachability made me feel at ease during the entire process. Their precision and skill during the filling procedure were commendable, resulting in a quick and painless experience.

Overall, my visit to Dr. Preksha Shah's clinic surpassed my expectations. The staff's friendliness, the clinic's cleanliness, and Dr. Shah's exceptional care make me wholeheartedly recommend their services to anyone in need of dental care.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
I had multiple fillings and RCT done. Apart from the quality of work, what was really impressive was the follow up care and close concern shown by the doctor. She would personally check in to see if there were any lingering problems and make sure all issues were resolved to my satisfaction even several days after appointments.

Preksha is great at what she does, is very courteous, and truly cares about the patients. I will certainly return for any and all dental treatment.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Dr. Preksha was attentive and explained the procedure to me beforehand so I understood what was required. The treatment was painless and effective. The doctor also took care to explain the required post-treatment care to be taken. I’d recommend Dr. Preksha’s clinic for any dental care services.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
I visited Dr. Preksha for a routine dental check-up. What I really liked about my visit was the time she took to examine my teeth, talk through dental hygiene must-dos and also did plaque cleaning without me asking for it. She is very friendly and easy to talk to.
Would highly recommend!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Despite going on a hectic Friday evening, Dr Preksha consulted me without any delay.  She was very friendly and helped explain all the issues and procedures. 
The procedure was painless and effective. I’d recommend Dr Preksha’s clinic and her services.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: I visited Dr. Preksha to get misaligned teeth fixed. She was very patient in understanding my concerns and explained the possible treatment options thoroughly. She recommended me invisble aligners and I went ahead with it. The cost is also fairly reasonable as I had checked the same with a few other clinics. The process was smooth and after the treatment my teeth look much better in shape. I feel a lot more confident about my smile and myself Thank you Dr. Preksha. Highly recommend her given she is among the best dentist I have come across.

tags: None
review:
I had approached Dr Preksha for my root canal treatment .She was very attentive and patient to listen to my concerns and ensured that I am understanding the problem at hand and explained the course of treatment with utmost simplicity so that I was feeling confident about the treatment .
 I am really happy with the treatment and I would strongly recommend Dr Preksha for any dental procedeures 

Thanks Dr Preksha

Would definitely recommend Happy Grins clinic if you are looking for painless and quick fix for your dental problems.

I am immensely grateful for her professionalism & highly recommend her to anyone seeking appropriate dental care!
